file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-11-02-04 - DOME LIGHT REFLECTOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DOME LIGHT REFLECTOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the pilot and copilot dome light reflectors. B. The pilot dome light is installed on the left side of the cockpit ceiling. The copilot dome light is installed on the right side of the cockpit ceiling. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-11-02-000-801-A DOME LIGHT REFLECTOR - REMOVAL DOME LIGHT REFLECTOR - INSTALLA- ALL 33-11-02-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-11-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-11-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. DOME LIGHT REFLECTOR - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the pilot and copilot dome light reflector. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-12-01-000-801-A/400 COCKPIT LINING - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit ceiling I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure the DOME switch, on the overhead panel, is in the OFF position. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the ceiling lining panel ( AMM TASK 25-12-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Disconnect the electrical connections (2). (3) Release and remove the reflector protective lens (3). (4) Remove the screws (4), washers and nuts (5) that attach the reflector (6) to the ceiling lining panel (1). (5) Remove the reflector (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-11-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Dome Light Reflector - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B ZONES 225 226 A DET. A 5. NUT WASHER WASHER 4. SCREW 1. CEILING LINING 7. LAMP PANEL 2. ELECTRICAL CONNECTION 6. REFLECTOR TAB 3. LENS DET. B 145AMM330058.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-11-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-11-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. DOME LIGHT REFLECTOR - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the pilot and copilot dome light reflector. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-11-00-700-801-A/500 COCKPIT LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST AMM TASK 33-11-01-400-801-A/400 DOME LIGHT LAMP - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit ceiling I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the reflector (6) in position. (2) Tighten the screws (4), washers and nuts (5) which attach the reflector (6) to the ceiling lining panel (1). (3) Make the electrical connections (2) again. (4) Install a lamp (7) (AMM TASK 33-11-01-400-801-A/400), if it is not installed. (5) Install the reflector lens (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the operational test of the light dome ( AMM TASK 33-11-00-700-801-A/500).
